Posts.Content: there seems to be so much information on hormone receptor positive women but nothing about hormone receptor negative breast cancer women??? what about us, any information would be happily read ..what happens to us, what do we do ??? just sit in the cemetary and wait ????
Posts.Title: What About us Women Who Are Not Hormone Positive????

Posts.Content: thank you for your reply ... it did make me feel somewhat better ... any info about the clinical study would be helpful to read ,,, where do i go to find out that information??? i did not do chemo, is that a big bad mistake???? thanks again .. patti (alicebtonkas@aol.com)
Posts.Title: What About us Women Who Are Not Hormone Positive????
